Name: Alone
About the game: Alone is a precision platformer made in hell itself, You play as a boy living in a world of shadows where you have to get through painfully hellish obstacles, Traps, and trials in the fastest time possible. Each level you face will get harder and harder to the point of it being painful but when you finally complete a level, it's all the more rewarding ! With over 30 levels to complete you won't be needing to pick up another game for a while! Complete levels in under a specified time to Star the level, But look out for easter eggs along the way to get special achievements! I'm sure you are going to enjoy this Indie game as much as I have enjoyed making it! This. is. Alone.
